pageContext.geocode_address: 206 Red Cross Way, Denver, CO 80230, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Are you ready for the Engineering Challenge? Learn to build mechanical devices such as a scissor lift, air compressor, or drawbridge in this advanced course for our strongest LEGO® builders. Then work in teams to accomplish a large-scale mission such as a minifigure rescue or a Rube Goldberg machine!
pageContext.action_url_comment: Students who sign up for this class must register for the entire day of programming through International School of Denver.  Click link or call (303) 340-3647
